Browse the source code of netbsd/external/mpl/bind/dist/lib/dns/include/dns/rpz.h

1/* $NetBSD: rpz.h,v 1.4 2019/04/28 00:01:14 christos Exp $ */

14
15#ifndef DNS_RPZ_H
16#define DNS_RPZ_H 1
17
18#include <inttypes.h>
19#include <stdbool.h>
20
21#include <isc/deprecated.h>
22#include <isc/event.h>
23#include <isc/ht.h>
24#include <isc/lang.h>
25#include <isc/refcount.h>
26#include <isc/rwlock.h>
27#include <isc/time.h>
28#include <isc/timer.h>
29
30#include <dns/fixedname.h>
31#include <dns/rdata.h>
32#include <dns/types.h>
33
34ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
35
36#define DNS_RPZ_PREFIX "rpz-"
37/*
38 * Sub-zones of various trigger types.
39 */
40#define DNS_RPZ_CLIENT_IP_ZONE DNS_RPZ_PREFIX"client-ip"
41#define DNS_RPZ_IP_ZONE DNS_RPZ_PREFIX"ip"
42#define DNS_RPZ_NSIP_ZONE DNS_RPZ_PREFIX"nsip"
43#define DNS_RPZ_NSDNAME_ZONE DNS_RPZ_PREFIX"nsdname"
44/*
45 * Special policies.
46 */
47#define DNS_RPZ_PASSTHRU_NAME DNS_RPZ_PREFIX"passthru"
48#define DNS_RPZ_DROP_NAME DNS_RPZ_PREFIX"drop"
49#define DNS_RPZ_TCP_ONLY_NAME DNS_RPZ_PREFIX"tcp-only"
50
51typedef uint8_t dns_rpz_prefix_t;
52
53typedef enum {
54 DNS_RPZ_TYPE_BAD,
55 DNS_RPZ_TYPE_CLIENT_IP,
56 DNS_RPZ_TYPE_QNAME,
57 DNS_RPZ_TYPE_IP,
58 DNS_RPZ_TYPE_NSDNAME,
59 DNS_RPZ_TYPE_NSIP
60} dns_rpz_type_t;
61
62/*
63 * Require DNS_RPZ_POLICY_PASSTHRU < DNS_RPZ_POLICY_DROP
64 * < DNS_RPZ_POLICY_TCP_ONLY DNS_RPZ_POLICY_NXDOMAIN < DNS_RPZ_POLICY_NODATA
65 * < DNS_RPZ_POLICY_CNAME to choose among competing policies.
66 */
67typedef enum {
68 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_GIVEN = 0, /* 'given': what policy record says */
69 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_DISABLED = 1, /* log what would have happened */
70 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_PASSTHRU = 2, /* 'passthru': do not rewrite */
71 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_DROP = 3, /* 'drop': do not respond */
72 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_TCP_ONLY = 4, /* 'tcp-only': answer UDP with TC=1 */
73 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_NXDOMAIN = 5, /* 'nxdomain': answer with NXDOMAIN */
74 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_NODATA = 6, /* 'nodata': answer with ANCOUNT=0 */
75 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_CNAME = 7, /* 'cname x': answer with x's rrsets */
76 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_RECORD,
77 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_WILDCNAME,
78 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_MISS,
79 DNS_RPZ_POLICY_ERROR
80} dns_rpz_policy_t;
81
82typedef uint8_t dns_rpz_num_t;
83
84#define DNS_RPZ_MAX_ZONES 64
85/*
86 * Type dns_rpz_zbits_t must be an unsigned int wide enough to contain
87 * at least DNS_RPZ_MAX_ZONES bits.
88 */
89typedef uint64_t dns_rpz_zbits_t;
90
91#define DNS_RPZ_ALL_ZBITS ((dns_rpz_zbits_t)-1)
92
93#define DNS_RPZ_INVALID_NUM DNS_RPZ_MAX_ZONES
94
95#define DNS_RPZ_ZBIT(n) (((dns_rpz_zbits_t)1) << (dns_rpz_num_t)(n))
96
97/*
98 * Mask of the specified and higher numbered policy zones
99 * Avoid hassles with (1<<33) or (1<<65)
100 */
101#define DNS_RPZ_ZMASK(n) ((dns_rpz_zbits_t)((((n) >= DNS_RPZ_MAX_ZONES-1) ? \
102 0 : (1ULL<<((n)+1))) -1))
103
104/*
105 * The trigger counter type.
106 */
107typedef size_t dns_rpz_trigger_counter_t;
108
109/*
110 * The number of triggers of each type in a response policy zone.
111 */
112typedef struct dns_rpz_triggers dns_rpz_triggers_t;
113struct dns_rpz_triggers {
114 dns_rpz_trigger_counter_t client_ipv4;
115 dns_rpz_trigger_counter_t client_ipv6;
116 dns_rpz_trigger_counter_t qname;
117 dns_rpz_trigger_counter_t ipv4;
118 dns_rpz_trigger_counter_t ipv6;
119 dns_rpz_trigger_counter_t nsdname;
120 dns_rpz_trigger_counter_t nsipv4;
121 dns_rpz_trigger_counter_t nsipv6;
122};
123
124/*
125 * A single response policy zone.
126 */
127typedef struct dns_rpz_zone dns_rpz_zone_t;
128typedef struct dns_rpz_zones dns_rpz_zones_t;
129
130struct dns_rpz_zone {
131 isc_refcount_t refs;
132 dns_rpz_num_t num; /* ordinal in list of policy zones */
133 dns_name_t origin; /* Policy zone name */
134 dns_name_t client_ip; /* DNS_RPZ_CLIENT_IP_ZONE.origin. */
135 dns_name_t ip; /* DNS_RPZ_IP_ZONE.origin. */
136 dns_name_t nsdname; /* DNS_RPZ_NSDNAME_ZONE.origin */
137 dns_name_t nsip; /* DNS_RPZ_NSIP_ZONE.origin. */
138 dns_name_t passthru; /* DNS_RPZ_PASSTHRU_NAME. */
139 dns_name_t drop; /* DNS_RPZ_DROP_NAME. */
140 dns_name_t tcp_only; /* DNS_RPZ_TCP_ONLY_NAME. */
141 dns_name_t cname; /* override value for ..._CNAME */
142 dns_ttl_t max_policy_ttl;
143 dns_rpz_policy_t policy; /* DNS_RPZ_POLICY_GIVEN or override */
144
145 uint32_t min_update_interval;/* minimal interval between updates */
146 isc_ht_t *nodes; /* entries in zone */
147 dns_rpz_zones_t *rpzs; /* owner */
148 isc_time_t lastupdated; /* last time the zone was processed */
149 bool updatepending; /* there is an update pending/waiting */
150 bool updaterunning; /* there is an update running */
151 dns_db_t *db; /* zones database */
152 dns_dbversion_t *dbversion; /* version we will be updating to */
153 dns_db_t *updb; /* zones database we're working on */
154 dns_dbversion_t *updbversion; /* version we're currently working on */
155 dns_dbiterator_t *updbit; /* iterator to use when updating */
156 isc_ht_t *newnodes; /* entries in zone being updated */
157 bool db_registered; /* is the notify event registered? */
158 bool addsoa; /* add soa to the additional section */
159 isc_timer_t *updatetimer;
160 isc_event_t updateevent;
161};
162
163/*
164 * Radix tree node for response policy IP addresses
165 */
166typedef struct dns_rpz_cidr_node dns_rpz_cidr_node_t;
167
168/*
169 * Bitfields indicating which policy zones have policies of
170 * which type.
171 */
172typedef struct dns_rpz_have dns_rpz_have_t;
173struct dns_rpz_have {
174 dns_rpz_zbits_t client_ipv4;
175 dns_rpz_zbits_t client_ipv6;
176 dns_rpz_zbits_t client_ip;
177 dns_rpz_zbits_t qname;
178 dns_rpz_zbits_t ipv4;
179 dns_rpz_zbits_t ipv6;
180 dns_rpz_zbits_t ip;
181 dns_rpz_zbits_t nsdname;
182 dns_rpz_zbits_t nsipv4;
183 dns_rpz_zbits_t nsipv6;
184 dns_rpz_zbits_t nsip;
185 dns_rpz_zbits_t qname_skip_recurse;
186};
187
188/*
189 * Policy options
190 */
191typedef struct dns_rpz_popt dns_rpz_popt_t;
192struct dns_rpz_popt {
193 dns_rpz_zbits_t no_rd_ok;
194 dns_rpz_zbits_t no_log;
195 dns_rpz_zbits_t nsip_on;
196 dns_rpz_zbits_t nsdname_on;
197 bool dnsrps_enabled;
198 bool break_dnssec;
199 bool qname_wait_recurse;
200 bool nsip_wait_recurse;
201 unsigned int min_ns_labels;
202 dns_rpz_num_t num_zones;
203};
204
205/*
206 * Response policy zones known to a view.
207 */
208struct dns_rpz_zones {
209 dns_rpz_popt_t p;
210 dns_rpz_zone_t *zones[DNS_RPZ_MAX_ZONES];
211 dns_rpz_triggers_t triggers[DNS_RPZ_MAX_ZONES];
212
213 /*
214 * RPZ policy version number.
215 * It is initially 0 and it increases whenever the server is
216 * reconfigured with new zones or policy.
217 */
218 int rpz_ver;
219
220 dns_rpz_zbits_t defined;
221
222 /*
223 * The set of records for a policy zone are in one of these states:
224 * never loaded load_begun=0 have=0
225 * during initial loading load_begun=1 have=0
226 * and rbtdb->rpzsp == rbtdb->load_rpzsp
227 * after good load load_begun=1 have!=0
228 * after failed initial load load_begun=1 have=0
229 * and rbtdb->load_rpzsp == NULL
230 * reloading after failure load_begun=1 have=0
231 * reloading after success
232 * main rpzs load_begun=1 have!=0
233 * load rpzs load_begun=1 have=0
234 */
235 dns_rpz_zbits_t load_begun;
236 dns_rpz_have_t have;
237
238 /*
239 * total_triggers maintains the total number of triggers in all
240 * policy zones in the view. It is only used to print summary
241 * statistics after a zone load of how the trigger counts
242 * changed.
243 */
244 dns_rpz_triggers_t total_triggers;
245
246 isc_mem_t *mctx;
247 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr;
248 isc_timermgr_t *timermgr;
249 isc_task_t *updater;
250 isc_refcount_t refs;
251 /*
252 * One lock for short term read-only search that guarantees the
253 * consistency of the pointers.
254 * A second lock for maintenance that guarantees no other thread
255 * is adding or deleting nodes.
256 */
257 isc_rwlock_t search_lock;
258 isc_mutex_t maint_lock;
259
260 dns_rpz_cidr_node_t *cidr;
261 dns_rbt_t *rbt;
262
263 /*
264 * DNSRPZ librpz configuration string and handle on librpz connection
265 */
266 char *rps_cstr;
267 size_t rps_cstr_size;
268 struct librpz_client *rps_client;
269};
270
271
272/*
273 * context for finding the best policy
274 */
275typedef struct {
276 unsigned int state;
277# define DNS_RPZ_REWRITTEN 0x0001
278# define DNS_RPZ_DONE_CLIENT_IP 0x0002 /* client IP address checked */
279# define DNS_RPZ_DONE_QNAME 0x0004 /* qname checked */
280# define DNS_RPZ_DONE_QNAME_IP 0x0008 /* IP addresses of qname checked */
281# define DNS_RPZ_DONE_NSDNAME 0x0010 /* NS name missed; checking addresses */
282# define DNS_RPZ_DONE_IPv4 0x0020
283# define DNS_RPZ_RECURSING 0x0040
284# define DNS_RPZ_ACTIVE 0x0080
285 /*
286 * Best match so far.
287 */
288 struct {
289 dns_rpz_type_t type;
290 dns_rpz_zone_t *rpz;
291 dns_rpz_prefix_t prefix;
292 dns_rpz_policy_t policy;
293 dns_ttl_t ttl;
294 isc_result_t result;
295 dns_zone_t *zone;
296 dns_db_t *db;
297 dns_dbversion_t *version;
298 dns_dbnode_t *node;
299 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
300 } m;
301 /*
302 * State for chasing IP addresses and NS names including recursion.
303 */
304 struct {
305 unsigned int label;
306 dns_db_t *db;
307 dns_rdataset_t *ns_rdataset;
308 dns_rdatatype_t r_type;
309 isc_result_t r_result;
310 dns_rdataset_t *r_rdataset;
311 } r;
312
313 /*
314 * State of real query while recursing for NSIP or NSDNAME.
315 */
316 struct {
317 isc_result_t result;
318 bool is_zone;
319 bool authoritative;
320 dns_zone_t *zone;
321 dns_db_t *db;
322 dns_dbnode_t *node;
323 dns_rdataset_t *rdataset;
324 dns_rdataset_t *sigrdataset;
325 dns_rdatatype_t qtype;
326 } q;
327
328 /*
329 * A copy of the 'have' and 'p' structures and the RPZ
330 * policy version as of the beginning of RPZ processing,
331 * used to avoid problems when policy is updated while
332 * RPZ recursion is ongoing.
333 */
334 dns_rpz_have_t have;
335 dns_rpz_popt_t popt;
336 int rpz_ver;
337
338 /*
339 * Shim db between BIND and DNRPS librpz.
340 */
341 dns_db_t *rpsdb;
342
343 /*
344 * p_name: current policy owner name
345 * r_name: recursing for this name to possible policy triggers
346 * f_name: saved found name from before recursion
347 */
348 dns_name_t *p_name;
349 dns_name_t *r_name;
350 dns_name_t *fname;
351 dns_fixedname_t _p_namef;
352 dns_fixedname_t _r_namef;
353 dns_fixedname_t _fnamef;
354} dns_rpz_st_t;
355
356#define DNS_RPZ_TTL_DEFAULT 5
357#define DNS_RPZ_MAX_TTL_DEFAULT DNS_RPZ_TTL_DEFAULT
358#define DNS_RPZ_MINUPDATEINTERVAL_DEFAULT 60
359
360/*
361 * So various response policy zone messages can be turned up or down.
362 */
363#define DNS_RPZ_ERROR_LEVEL ISC_LOG_WARNING
364#define DNS_RPZ_INFO_LEVEL ISC_LOG_INFO
365#define DNS_RPZ_DEBUG_LEVEL1 ISC_LOG_DEBUG(1)
366#define DNS_RPZ_DEBUG_LEVEL2 ISC_LOG_DEBUG(2)
367#define DNS_RPZ_DEBUG_LEVEL3 ISC_LOG_DEBUG(3)
368#define DNS_RPZ_DEBUG_QUIET (DNS_RPZ_DEBUG_LEVEL3+1)
369
370const char *
371dns_rpz_type2str(dns_rpz_type_t type);
372
373dns_rpz_policy_t
374dns_rpz_str2policy(const char *str);
375
376const char *
377dns_rpz_policy2str(dns_rpz_policy_t policy);
378
379dns_rpz_policy_t
380dns_rpz_decode_cname(dns_rpz_zone_t *rpz, dns_rdataset_t *rdataset,
381 dns_name_t *selfname);
382
383isc_result_t
384dns_rpz_new_zones(dns_rpz_zones_t **rpzsp, char *rps_cstr,
385 size_t rps_cstr_size, isc_mem_t *mctx,
386 isc_taskmgr_t *taskmgr, isc_timermgr_t *timermgr);
387
388isc_result_t
389dns_rpz_new_zone(dns_rpz_zones_t *rpzs, dns_rpz_zone_t **rpzp);
390
391isc_result_t
392dns_rpz_dbupdate_callback(dns_db_t *db, void *fn_arg);
393
394void
395dns_rpz_attach_rpzs(dns_rpz_zones_t *source, dns_rpz_zones_t **target);
396
397void
398dns_rpz_detach_rpzs(dns_rpz_zones_t **rpzsp);
399
400isc_result_t
401dns_rpz_beginload(dns_rpz_zones_t **load_rpzsp,
402 dns_rpz_zones_t *rpzs, dns_rpz_num_t rpz_num)
403 ISC_DEPRECATED;
404
405isc_result_t
406dns_rpz_ready(dns_rpz_zones_t *rpzs,
407 dns_rpz_zones_t **load_rpzsp, dns_rpz_num_t rpz_num)
408 ISC_DEPRECATED;
409
410isc_result_t
411dns_rpz_add(dns_rpz_zones_t *rpzs, dns_rpz_num_t rpz_num,
412 const dns_name_t *name);
413
414void
415dns_rpz_delete(dns_rpz_zones_t *rpzs, dns_rpz_num_t rpz_num,
416 const dns_name_t *name);
417
418dns_rpz_num_t
419dns_rpz_find_ip(dns_rpz_zones_t *rpzs, dns_rpz_type_t rpz_type,
420 dns_rpz_zbits_t zbits, const isc_netaddr_t *netaddr,
421 dns_name_t *ip_name, dns_rpz_prefix_t *prefixp);
422
423dns_rpz_zbits_t
424dns_rpz_find_name(dns_rpz_zones_t *rpzs, dns_rpz_type_t rpz_type,
425 dns_rpz_zbits_t zbits, dns_name_t *trig_name);
426
427ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
428
429#endif /* DNS_RPZ_H */
